name: Cyberfunk 201111
description:
Sick of delays from CD Projekt Red, I decided to take matters into my own hand and created this Cyberpunk 2077 "inspired" game over the course of one weekend. It was never intended for other people to play and it's awful and riddled with glitches. Enjoy.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

Shift - Sprint

TAB - Upgrade Menu

ESC - Exi

E - Interact

LMB - Shoot and interact

RMB - Zoom

Mousewheel - Change weapon
